title: Layered Courgette Cake
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '600g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 eggs', '350ml vegetable oil', '375g grated courgette', '225g cream cheese', '110g butter', '240g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
